PlaySoundsFromList (script guid: 76a895b5e674db04d8b4f8110c068852, component fileID: 341662333) on m_GameObject fileID 341662330; shouldLoop=0; audioClips count=2 (guids: 3c7b3ef689cc94af0bd824489050effd, 02e01164404134d2c9265aa08b65ba96). Expect to start playing clip at current index (initially 0). Note: AudioSource.loop is set via OnValidate only; no UnityEvent m_Calls defined.
Advance to next clip and play it; verifies index increment and wrap handling for NextClip with 2 clips.
Go to previous clip and play it; from index 1 expect index 0. Checks PreviousClip modulo behavior.
Call PreviousClip again when at index 0; due to --index % Count yielding -1 and Mathf.Abs in PlayClip, expect wrap to last clip (index 1 with 2 clips). Validates edge-case wrap-around.
Play a random clip; with 2 clips expect either index 0 or 1. Confirms Random.Range(0, Count) int behavior (max exclusive).
Pause current playing clip; verify AudioSource.Pause() behavior.

Stop current playing clip; verify AudioSource.Stop() behavior. Note: PlayAtIndex(int) cannot be tested via Trigger (has parameter) and appears to allow index==Count which would be out-of-range on play.
